headline.print_headline: Iran Says Possible Response to New U.S. Sanctions Could Not Be 'Pleasant'
headline.main: Iran Says Possible Response to New U.S. Sanctions Could Not Be 'Pleasant'

docs.snippet: Iran's possible response to new U.S. sanctions could "not be pleasant", its foreign minister said on Sunday, raising the prospect of tit-for-tat retribution against the Islamic Republic's old adversary weeks ahead of fresh nuclear talks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran's possible response to new U.S. sanctions could "not be pleasant", its foreign minister said on Sunday, raising the prospect of tit-for-tat retribution against the Islamic Republic's old adversary weeks ahead of fresh nuclear talks.

headline.print_headline: Israel Calls on Region to Rebuild, Disarm Gaza
headline.main: Israel Calls on Region to Rebuild, Disarm Gaza

docs.snippet: Israel and several Arab countries should work together to rebuild the Gaza Strip while disarming Hamas militants who rule the territory, Israel's finance minister said Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Israel and several Arab countries should work together to rebuild the Gaza Strip while disarming Hamas militants who rule the territory, Israel's finance minister said Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Algeria Soccer Death Seen as Part of Wider Ills
headline.main: Algeria Soccer Death Seen as Part of Wider Ills

docs.snippet: The rocks came raining down after the final whistle of the Algerian soccer match, an increasingly common ritual in stadiums across the country. This time, the violence ended in tragedy: Hit in the head, Albert Ebosse, the league's top goal scorer ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The rocks came raining down after the final whistle of the Algerian soccer match, an increasingly common ritual in stadiums across the country. This time, the violence ended in tragedy: Hit in the head, Albert Ebosse, the league's top goal scorer last season, crumbled to the ground and died in a hospital.

headline.print_headline: Poll Shows Britain's UKIP to Win Parliamentary Seat After Lawmaker Defection
headline.main: Poll Shows Britain's UKIP to Win Parliamentary Seat After Lawmaker Defection

docs.snippet: Britain's anti-EU UK Independence Party (UKIP) will win its first directly elected parliamentary seat after the defection of a lawmaker from Prime Minister David Cameron's Conservative party last week, an opinion poll on Sunday showed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's anti-EU UK Independence Party (UKIP) will win its first directly elected parliamentary seat after the defection of a lawmaker from Prime Minister David Cameron's Conservative party last week, an opinion poll on Sunday showed.

headline.sub: Child killed as explosion hits building in Paris suburb
headline.main: Child killed as explosion hits building in Paris suburb

docs.snippet: A child is killed after an explosion rocks a four-story building in a northeastern suburb of Paris. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: A child is killed after an explosion rocks a four-story building in a northeastern suburb of Paris. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.print_headline: EU Wields Russia Sanctions Threat but Timing Vague
headline.main: EU Wields Russia Sanctions Threat but Timing Vague

docs.snippet: The European Union threatened Russia with new trade sanctions if Moscow fails to start reversing its action in Ukraine, but sharp divisions among leaders at a summit in Brussels left the timing of any measures uncertain....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union threatened Russia with new trade sanctions if Moscow fails to start reversing its action in Ukraine, but sharp divisions among leaders at a summit in Brussels left the timing of any measures uncertain.

headline.sub: Police, demonstrators come to blows in Islamabad
headline.main: Police, demonstrators come to blows in Islamabad

docs.snippet: More tension between anti-government protesters and security forces in Islamabad. Julie Noce reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: More tension between anti-government protesters and security forces in Islamabad. Julie Noce reports.

headline.main: 1939: Britain on War Basis With Reservists Called, Navy Fully Mobilized, Telephone Connection Cut

docs.snippet: From the International Herald Tribune archives: Britain starts preparing for war in 1939....
docs.abstract: From the International Herald Tribune archives: Britain starts preparing for war in 1939.

headline.print_headline: Somalia: 12 Killed as Army Repels Attack on Prison
headline.main: Somalia: 12 Killed as Army Repels Attack on Prison

docs.snippet: Somalia's government forces regained control of a high security prison in the capital that was attacked Sunday by seven heavily armed suspected Islamic militants who attempted to free other extremists held there, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Somalia's government forces regained control of a high security prison in the capital that was attacked Sunday by seven heavily armed suspected Islamic militants who attempted to free other extremists held there, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Lava Eruption Prompts Iceland Aviation Alert
headline.main: Lava Eruption Prompts Iceland Aviation Alert

docs.snippet: Lava fountains danced along a lengthy volcanic fissure near Iceland's subglacial Bardarbunga volcano Sunday, prompting authorities to raise the aviation warning code to the highest level and close the surrounding airspace....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lava fountains danced along a lengthy volcanic fissure near Iceland's subglacial Bardarbunga volcano Sunday, prompting authorities to raise the aviation warning code to the highest level and close the surrounding airspace.
